result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew W. Gendron

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Matthew W. Gendron
Current: 728 1/2 Jackson St, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 01-13-2016)
Prior: 717 Mcclellan Street, Wausau, WI 54403

Clerk: Kimberly
Case called:  
INCLUDES 14CF871, 15CF341, 15CF571

State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher, Deft appears in person with Atty Pauline Toulouse
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:

14CF871:
Dismiss "involve injury" enhancer on Ct 1
Ct 3 (Operate w/o valid license (2nd w/in 3 yrs) >> D&RI

15CF342:
Ct 1 Bail Jumping Felony- Repeater >> D&RI
Ct 2 Bail Jumping Felony- Repeater >> D&RI
Ct 3 Posses Drug Paraphernalia- Repeater >> D&RI

15CF571:
Ct 1 Bail Jumping- Felony >> D&RI

COURT grants above

PLEA: 
14CF871
Ct 1 Hit & Run >> NO CONTEST
Ct 2 Cause Injury/Operate-Control Substance (1st) (PAC<0.15) >> NO CONTEST

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
 
14CF871
Ct 1 Hit & Run >> $150 fine plus court costs

Ct 2 Cause Injury/Operate-Control Substance (1st) (PAC<0.15) >> $1700 fine inclusive of court costs, 60 days MCJ with huber priv. for work/school/treatment, 14 months DL revocation. AODA, no objection to EMP

Adj: 3:08pm
in Support of Blood Search Warrant

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Includes 15CF342 and 15CF571.    Shall not consume alcohol.  Shall not possess drugs or alcohol.  Absolute sobriety (drugs/alcohol).    No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents.    Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 for drugs/alcohol with DAY REPORTING.
